name: TV TCL 40D3000 / RD512KS-RU
origAbout: With brightness enhancing technology, the TCL TVs can enhance the brightness so as to provide more natural pictures and make sure that you can see clear images in the sunlight. Wide Viewing Angle - Making everyone fit in the living room is difficult. With the innovative technique by TCL, the viewing angle of TCL TV will be extended and the brightness of TV will be enhanced, which means that you can also get the perfect detail even when you are sitting in the corner of the living room.
